dt-example.title: ColReorder
dt-example.info:
This example shows the [ColReorder extension](//datatables.net/extensions/colreorder) for DataTables being used with FixedColumns. The integration between these extensions has been partially supported in the past, but it is now fully supported as of version 4.0.0 of FixedColumns.
Previously, Fixed Columns could not be reordered. Now they can, and the calculations are run again, fixing the new columns that are furthest to the left and right as described by the configuration.
